text: The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then the Bigfoot is a 2018 American adventure drama movie written and directed by Robert D. Krzykowski. in his feature debut. The movie stars Sam Elliott as Calvin Barr, with Aidan Turner, Larry Miller, Ron Livingston, and Caitlin FitzGerald in supporting roles. == References == Category:2018 adventure movies
title: The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then the Bigfoot
